mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_name, member_password, member_username, member_department, member_local, member_start_date, member_LDAP, member_role, member_phone_number, member_team) VALUES (#{member_name}, #{member_password}, #{member_username}, #{member_department}, #{member_local}, #{member_start_date}, #{member_LDAP}, #{member_role}, #{member_phone_number}, #{member_team})
mapper.select: select member_password form member where member_password = #{member_password}
mapper.update: update member set member_password = #{member_password}, member_nickname = #{member_nickname}, member_age = #{member_age}, member_phone = #{member_phone}, member_job = #{member_job}, member_local = #{member_local}, member_email = #{member_email}, member_money = #{member_money} where member_id = #{member_id}
